wheel.tip-entries: You need at least 2 entries to start using the wheel

forgot-pass-modal.title: Password Reset
forgot-pass-modal.desc: Provide the email associated with your account to recover your password.

reset-pass-modal.title: Password Reset
reset-pass-modal.desc: Enter a new password, it will replace your old password.

confirm-modal.body-create-nested: Do you want to create a nested wheel for the entry "{{name}}"?
confirm-modal.body-delete-entry:
Are you sure you want to delete this entry? It has a wheel attached. 
 This action cannot be undone.
confirm-modal.body-create-wheel:
Are you sure you want to create a new wheel? 
 Any unsaved changes will be lost.
confirm-modal.body-delete-wheel:
Are you sure you want to delete this wheel? 
 This action cannot be undone.

message.pass-reset-completed:
Your password was updated.
You can now log in.

message.wheel-deleted: The wheel has been deleted successfully.

password-validations.lowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
